mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission_info (permission_id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_desc, permission_navi, permission_url, permission_create_time, permission_update_time, permission_valid) values (#{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionNavi,jdbcType=BIT}, #{permissionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{permissionUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{permissionValid,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update sys_permission_info set permission_name = #{permissionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_code = #{permissionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_desc = #{permissionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_navi = #{permissionNavi,jdbcType=BIT}, permission_url = #{permissionUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission_create_time = #{permissionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, permission_update_time = #{permissionUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, permission_valid = #{permissionValid,jdbcType=BIT} where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select permission_id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_desc, permission_navi, permission_url, permission_create_time, permission_update_time, permission_valid from sys_permission_info where permission_id = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select permission_id, permission_name, permission_code, permission_desc, permission_navi, permission_url, permission_create_time, permission_update_time, permission_valid from sys_permission_info
